org.fcrepo.auth.oauth

Interface TokenRequestValidations

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultTokenRequestValidations

    public interface TokenRequestValidations
    Validations for OAuth token requests

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isValidAuthCode(org.apache.oltu.oauth2.as.request.OAuthTokenRequest oauthRequest)
      Checks the validity of the auth code attached to the given request
      boolean isValidClient(org.apache.oltu.oauth2.as.request.OAuthTokenRequest oauthRequest)
      Checks the validity of the client associated with the given request
      boolean isValidCredentials(org.apache.oltu.oauth2.as.request.OAuthTokenRequest oauthRequest)
      Checks the validity of the authN credentials associated with the given request
      boolean isValidSecret(org.apache.oltu.oauth2.as.request.OAuthTokenRequest oauthRequest)
      Checks the validity of the secret given with the given request
